text: Cathedral Basilica of the Sacred Heart This is a list of current and former Roman Catholic churches in the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Newark. The archdiocese covers northeastern New Jersey, including the cities of Newark and Jersey City and the counties of Bergen, and Essex, Hudson, and Union. The cathedral church of the archdiocese is the Cathedral Basilica of the Sacred Heart in Newark. ==Bergen County== ===Fort Lee=== {|class="wikitable sortable" style="width:75%" !
